resources.string:
You are using alpha1 version of the Official FetLife App 3.0.0 

This means some of the core features are still missing and you might face unexpected behaviour, errors and crashes. 

If you had any feedback, remarks or you just would like te report a bug, please feel free to get in contact with us via our Github page: https://github.com/fetlife/android or reach out directly to our Android developer via FetLife messaging (username: Dreamlite) or via email: krisztian@fetlife.com. 

Thank you for using this App
This feature is being implemented and not available in this version. \n\nThank you for your understandings

This feature is going to reuse some part of the website as embedded screens. 
This solution is still under implementation and proper interaction with other part of the App is not yet solved in this version 

Thank you for your understandings

In this alpha version explore section is still under implementation.
It means some of your explore section lists are not complete and some items might be missing. 

Thank you for your understandings

Favorites is a new feature in the new version of the FetLife App. 
Any items, including posts, pictures, members, group discussions, etc can be added to your favorites list 

Note: favorite items are stored in your app locally and not backed up to FetLife servers. This also means that unlike loves they are not visible to any other users.
